caption.p: Results of seedlings health and vigor ( A) number of leaves on seedlings on mowed and unmowed plants (P < 0.001), ( B) seedling height (cm) on both treatments (P < 0.001) mowed (orange) and unmowed (blue) plants. Means are shown by scale bars and asterisk denotes significantly different results at P < 0.05, while ns denotes non-significant results.
